BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: JOHN S AND JAMES L KNIGHT FOUNDATION

SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: WHAT ATTACHES PEOPLE TO PLACE: THE JOHN S. AND JAMES L. KNIGHT FOUNDATION IS COMMISSIONING A MAJOR STUDY ON THE FACTORS THAT ATTACH PEOPLE TO PLACE, AND CONNECT THEM TO THE COMMUNITIES AND NEIGHBORHOODS WHERE THEY LIVE. THE RESULTS OF THE STUDY COULD HELP INFORM APPROACHES THAT PROMOTE CONNECTION TO AND PRIDE IN PLACE, COMMUNITY VITALITY, CONNECTIONS ACROSS RESIDENTS, AND THE ECONOMIC AND CULTURAL VIBRANCY OF COMMUNITIES. THE RESULTS OF THE STUDY WILL BE WIDELY DISSEMINATED AND MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: KNIGHT ARTS CHALLENGE:THE KNIGHT ARTS CHALLENGE IS AN OPEN CALL TO INDIVIDUAL ARTISTS AND ARTS ORGANIZATIONS TO PRESENT THEIR BEST IDEA FOR THE ARTS IN THE MIAMI METRO AREA. THROUGH ITS BROAD ELIGIBILITY AND INTENSIVE OUTREACH STRATEGIES, EMERGING ARTISTS ARE IDENTIFIED, PROMISING NEW PROJECTS ARE SURFACED, AND ARTS INSTITUTIONS ARE ENCOURAGED TO INNOVATE. THIS PROGRAM DIRECTLY SUPPORTS THE VIBRANCY OF THE ARTS ECOSYSTEM IN MIAMI. THE ARTS CHALLENGE HELPS TO INFORM THE GENERAL COMMUNITY OF THESE EXCELLENT ARTS ACTIVITIES WHILE AT THE SAME TIME BUILDING COMMON BONDS AMONG RESIDENTS.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description3Txt: KNIGHT'S TRUST, MEDIA AND DEMOCRACY: AS PART OF KNIGHT'S TRUST, MEDIA AND DEMOCRACY INITIATIVE TO EXPLORE THE ROLE OF TRUST IN JOURNALISM IN OUR DEMOCRACY, THIS WORK INCLUDED SIGNIFICANT OPINION RESEARCH AND SURVEYS CONDUCTED BY INDEPENDENT THIRD-PARTY FIRMS THAT WERE PUBLICLY DISSEMINATED. THESE SURVEYS EXPLORED MEDIA ATTITUDES AS WELL AS WAYS TO BUILD TRUST IN INFORMATION.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description4Txt: KNIGHT CITY CHALLENGE:IN SUPPORT OF THE KNIGHT'S COMMUNITIES, THE KNIGHT CITIES CHALLENGE, SURFACED AND SUPPORTED THE MOST INNOVATIVE AND PROMISING PROJECTS THAT WORK TOWARDS ONE OR MORE OF THREE KEY FACTORS IN CITY SUCCESS; ATTRACTING AND RETAINING TALENT, EXPANDING ECONOMIC OPPORTUNITY AND SUPPORTING CIVIC ENGAGEMENT. THE CHALLENGE FUNDED THE PROJECTS, RESEARCHED THEIR IMPACT, DISSEMINATED ANY LEARNING DEVELOPED FROM THE PROJECTS AND NETWORKED CHALLENGE GRANTEES WITH EACH OTHER, AS WELL AS KNIGHT STAFF AND FIELD AND CIVIC LEADERS. 2017 WAS THE FINAL YEAR OF THE CHALLENGE.

SumOfProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Description1Txt: LAB305, LLC:TO CONNECT MIAMI'S EMERGING ENTREPRENEURS WITH THE CORPORATE COMMUNITY THROUGH EVENTS, EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES AND OTHER ACTIVITIES THAT SPUR INNOVATION AND HELP LAUNCH AND SCALE NEW IDEAS.
SumOfProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Description2Txt: MATTER VENTURES: TO INITIATE AND ADVISE INNOVATION IN PUBLIC MEDIA BY ESTABLISHING THE KNIGHT PRX PUBLIC MEDIA ACCELERATOR

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: APPLICATIONS FOR FUNDING ARE SUBMITTED ELECTRONICALLY VIA THE FOUNDATION WEBSITE. PLEASE GO TO WWW.KF.ORG TO APPLY FOR A GRANT. FOR JOURNALISM, COMMUNITIES, NATIONAL AND ARTS PROGRAMS, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION IN OUR ONLINE FORM: TELL US ABOUT THE OPPORTUNITY PRESENTED BY YOUR IDEA/PROJECT, WHAT IT WILL TRANSFORM, AND THE IMPACT IT WILL HAVE. HOW WILL IT CREATE LASTING, VISIBLE CHANGE? TELL US HOW YOU INDENTIFIED THIS OPPORTUNITY AND WHY THE TIME IS RIGHT FOR IT. WHAT OTHER PARTNERS OR FUNDERS ARE INVOLVED IN THE IDEA/PROJECT? HOW WILL YOU MEASURE SUCCESS? HOW ARE YOU UNIQUELY QUALIFIED TO IMPLEMENT YOUR IDEA/PROJECT? PLEASE DESCRIBE ORGANIZATIONAL AND FINANCIAL CAPACITY TO IMPLEMENT YOUR IDEA/PROJECT INCLUDING ANY BUSINESS PLAN. HOW WILL YOUR IDEA/PROJECT BE SUSTAINED BEYOND KNIGHT FOUNDATION'S FUNDING?
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: WITH THE EXCEPTION OF SPECIAL INITIATIVES AND CONTESTS, THE FOUNDATION DOES NOT HAVE DEADLINES.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: ANY RESTRICTIONS OR LIMITATIONS ON AWARDS, SUCH AS BY GEOGRAPHICAL AREAS, CHARITABLE FIELDS, KIND OF INSTITUTIONS OR OTHER FACTORS: -MEDICAL RESEARCH, ORGANIZATIONS OR PROJECTS WHOSE MISSION IS TO PREVENT, ERADICATE AND/OR ALLEVIATE THE EFFECTS OF A SPECIFIC DISEASE -POLITICAL CAMPAIGNS AND LEGISLATIVE LOBBYING EFFORTS -PROJECTS THAT EXCLUSIVELY SERVE RELIGIOUS PURPOSES -DIRECT SUPPORT FOR INDIVIDUALS
